name: Poachin' Jeff
description:
Poachin' Jeff is once again late for his gift shopping. Luckily, his neighbors constantly order all kinds of packages from Zamano. You can still get your gifts in time!

Gameplay

- Use directional buttons to move around

- Cross the street into the garden

- Grab the box and avoid being caught!

- Drop the box in your awesome pickup truck!

- Make yourself proud and be quick about it!

The Third Jab

Ninjabba, creator of Wyvern Tales 
Exofrenon, pixels are in his blood 
SideFX, does miracles for music and sound effects
